pr_title: Add 'Generate constructor' option to 'Show Fixes' options for fields

timeline.bodyText: we're basically recomputing the actions a 2nd time, seems suboptimal. Couldn't we just copy the ones we have already and change their kind?
timeline.author: fbricon

timeline.message:
Add 'Generate constructor' option to 'Show Fixes' options for fields

Signed-off-by: Snjezana Peco <snjezana.peco@redhat.com>

Add 'Generate constructor' option to 'Show Fixes' options for fields
